reporting_cycle: as appropriate, in the context of his regular reporting on Afghanistan
summary:
The Security Council,
 Reaffirming its previous resolutions on Afghanistan and commitment to its sovereignty, independence, territorial integrity and national unity,
 Recognizing the Transitional Administration as Afghanistan's sole legitimate Government pending 2004 democratic elections,
 Welcomes and endorses the Kabul Declaration on Good-Neighbourly Relations signed on 22 December 2002 by Afghanistan and its neighbouring states,
 Calls on all States to respect and support the Declaration's provisions,
 Requests the Secretary-General to report on the Declaration's implementation,
 Decides to remain seized of the matter.
